snippet: As tensions between Muslims and Jews worsen abroad, an American Jew working for an Islamic nonprofit organization has received vitriol from Jewish communities for his criticism of Israel.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column highlights Jacob Bender, Jewish man who serves as executive director for chapter of Council on American-Islamic Relations in Philadelphia, first non-Muslim to hold such high-ranking position within CAIR; Bender has received vitriol from Jewish communities for his criticism of Israel.
lead_paragraph: As tensions between Muslims and Jews worsen abroad, an American Jew working for an Islamic nonprofit organization has received vitriol from Jewish communities for his criticism of Israel.

headline.print_headline: Guided by History, a Jew Tries to Unite Two Faiths Divided by War in Gaza
headline.main: Guided by History, a Jew Tries to Unite Two Faiths Divided by War in Gaza
